tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: Dream Team
programme.desc: A sailor dies during a fight aboard a ship at sea; Bud discovers the explanation. Mattie wakes up and talks. The general announces a reorganization, orders, and a promotion.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Pilot, Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: A woman radar-intercept officer (RIO) disappears at night from an aircraft carrier in the Adriatic Sea. Two JAG lawyers, Lt. Harm Rabb and Lt. Caitlin Pike, investigate and solve. Harm, a former Naval aviator, unexpectedly becomes a hero.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Shadow
programme.desc: A civilian tech rep aboard a submarine seizes control of an experimental torpedo after its launch during an exercise.(n)

programme.title: JAG: déjà vu (AKA Soldier of Love)
programme.desc: Three Navy lieutenants die by homicide in 11 months around Washington. Harm and Meg investigate.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Desert Son
programme.desc: Due to a human error in an exercise, artillery fire injures seven Marines, one of whom later dies.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Area 51
programme.desc: To help fund Walter's research into saving his sister's life, Team Scorpion takes a lucrative job for the CIA to find a top-secret aircraft in the mysterious Area 51.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: US vs. UN vs. UK
programme.desc: Team Scorpion is blackmailed to break into the United Nations to assist in the assassination of a menacing arms dealer.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Arrivals And Departures
programme.desc: When Team Scorpion and Walter's parents visit Megan in the hospital as her health deteriorates, they are quarantined after a deadly fungus outbreak threatens to infect everyone.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: The Old College Try
programme.desc: Team Scorpion goes undercover at a university to find a hacker who infiltrates the Federal Reserve and threatens to collapse the world economy.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Dam Breakthrough
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Team Scorpion must prevent a catastrophe when torrential rains create a large crack in a dam, threatening to wipe out an entire town in its wake.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: White Out
programme.desc: In order to save a United States Special Forces unit from certain death, Team Scorpion must brave the subzero temperatures of Antarctica.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Letting Go
programme.desc: When Nick’s estranged older brother emerges with new information on someone from their tragic past, Nick goes off the grid to track the man down. But Juliet is hot on his heels, and Nick is forced to let her into the secrets of his past.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: A Real Gentleman
programme.desc: When Traci is a no-show for her first raid, 15 Division fears the notorious gun dealer they’re after has kidnapped her. But when Andy realizes that the serial rapist we never caught is back, it’s all hands on deck to find Traci.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Home Run
programme.desc: After a community-outreach baseball game erupts in a drive-by shooting, Gail’s relationship with her brother is put to the test . Meanwhile, Swarek plans a getaway with Andy up to Oliver’s cabin, which goes off the rails in every possible way.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Best Man
programme.desc: Andy and Sam are shocked to learn that Oliver is the prime suspect in IA’s corruption investigation into 15 Division. They only have until end of day today to find Chris Klem – the missing explosives-dealer – and clear Oliver’s name.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Integrity Test
programme.desc: With Oliver still the prime suspect in the bombing of 15’s evidence room, Andy, Dov, Gail, and Nick undertake a risky – and potentially career-ending – plan to prove that Commissioner Alonso Santana is corrupt.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Part two of their investigation into Clifton Hall sees the team splitting with going it alone. For one of the team the night becomes terrifying as they find themselves locked in a room with an unseen force.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her team take on their largest investigation to date. They have been invited to investigate a large estate where it seems just about every building has a ghostly tale.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: As the team split up the fear become palpable. Without the safety of numbers the team are feeling they are being stalked and Glen comes face to face with some unexplained physical phenomena.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: With the team on edge, they explore deeper into the darkness of this incredible place of mystery and secrets. Is the feeling of unease just in their minds or is something about to reveal itself.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Crossing Over
programme.desc: TAPS calls in the GHI team to investigate the Spalding Inn, a historic property in Whitefield, New Hampshire owned by Jason and Grant.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Family Plot
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Lucas, Ohio for two cases. The first stop, to look into phenomena connected to a gruesome event, The Ceely Rose Murders.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: A Ghost of a Marine
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads toMount Joy, Pennsylvania to help out the Great-Great Granddaughter of Alois Bube, the founder of Bube's Brewery.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Vintage Spirits
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS is called to Liberty, Missouri to investigate the Belvoir Winery.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Ghost Guards
programme.desc: An armory that's been standing for over 100 years harbors a ghostly mystery. Recent female leadership is coinciding with increased paranormal activity.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Vault of the Heavens
programme.desc: Dylan hears voices beckoning him to a planet of "fire and ice.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Deep Midnight's Voice
programme.desc: While caught in a battle between two Nietzschean prides, the crew captures a hostile who claims that his pride possesses a map of the slipstream.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.sub-title: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.191
programme.desc: In a divorce battle, a woman loans $2,000 for legal fees. A karate school owner sues a motorist over a collision impacting business. Teens and moms dispute a traded Ford Mustang's value.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.96
programme.desc: A woman is suing her husband’s ex-wife and teenage daughter for damaging her car when the teenager allegedly pounded it with her fist/A teenager is accused of horsing around and crashing a relative’s Oldsmobile Allero into a curb.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.86
programme.desc: Botched deal to trade babysitting for rent leaves ex-roommates fighting over dumped clothes and unpaid bills. Woman accuses friend of kidnapping her kids during her jail time, refuses to repay dental loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.55
programme.desc: Teen throws house party while dad's away; alleged damages to neighbor's car ensue. Young ex-lovers dispute alleged loan for body-piercing school. Woman sues body-piercing student ex-roommate for unpaid rent.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.40
programme.desc: Electrician denies vandalizing home, stealing materials post-firing. Expert witness called for damages/Woman sues ex for furniture return; he claims she gave it when moving out.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.196
programme.desc: Louis Vuitton bag allegedly stolen during nightclub visit by father-son duo. Dog-grooming aspirant clashes with landlord over rented room in her house.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.220
programme.desc: A teenager alleges her college scholarship was at risk due to her roommate's drug use. Another teen, attempting to jump over a vintage Mustang, lands on the car and is sued for damages by the owner.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.107
programme.desc: Woman countersues roommate's husband for sexual advances amid back rent lawsuit/Man denies requesting mother's payments on Audi A6 in lawsuit.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.95
programme.desc: An intoxicated teenager confesses to urinating in a friend’s yard; she sues her ex-friend for coming to her workplace and telling everyone about it.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.158
programme.desc: College students sue ex-friend over lease break. Woman denies child support responsibility if son not living with her; grandmother sues for medical bills.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.232
programme.desc: A man accidentally crashes his date's car while teaching her to drive in the snow, leading to a lawsuit. Divorced parents dispute sharing the cost of their teenager's snowboarding camp trip.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay brings in helping hands to staff the dinner service in the final challenge; tempers flare between competitors; the winner becomes the new head chef of one of Ramsay's Las Vegas restaurants.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Fifteen vie for the position of executive chef at Gordon Ramsay's new restaurant, scheduled to open in the summer of 2008; Gordon gets physically sick from a contestant's concoction; one contestant goes missing.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Each team must accurately slice a halibut into six-ounce fillets; one member of each team must work as the maitre d' while the others staff the kitchen; one chef is eliminated.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The contestants are made to catch hens in their living room to prepare for a family-style chicken dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: On family night, the team that makes the most fresh pasta for that night's dinner service wins a day of fun at the Santa Monica Pier. An accident sends one contestant to the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The aspiring chefs compete to create the best gourmet pizza, after which the winning team will enjoy a gourmet meal in Santa Barbara and the losing team will take and deliver pizza orders.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Jane Riddell, chief operating officer of GoodLife Fitness, disguises herself as a Zumba-instructor trainee, a maintenance worker and a salesperson.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Stacey Mowbray, CEO of Canada’s largest specialty coffee company goes undercover and gets into the grind serving lattes to get an edge on customer service and revive her connection with frontline workers.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Toronto Transit Commission (TTC) City Councillor and TTC Chair Karen Stintz goes undercover inside the country's largest mass transit system to get her hands dirty with some of the toughest and grittiest jobs.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Michael Sneyd, CEO of mega resort business Skyline International Development, goes undercover to get creative with the employees at the foot of the chain and take their ideas to new heights.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo starts 9pm
programme.desc: STARTS 9PM Take a ride along with Operation Repo! This docudrama series takes an in-depth look at the professional, but sometimes murky world of car repossession. Get ready for the drama!(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Big Picture
programme.desc: When his mother cuts off Russell’s trust fund, he gets a taste of how life will be after moving in with Timmy. Meanwhile, Audrey helps Jeff impress his boss in order to get a raise.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Fun Run
programme.desc: After Jeff tells his altruistic co-workers that requests for charity donations are getting out of hand, Audrey enters into a 10K charity event and plans on having Jeff's staff contribute money toward the cause.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Refusing To Budget
programme.desc: Timmy convinces Russell he needs a budget when the utilities are turned off in his apartment. Meanwhile, Audrey has a mentee who wants to see her office and learn about publishing.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Little Bummer Boy
programme.desc: When Russell decides to borrow a holiday concept of gift-giving from Adam, both Adam and his co-workers are in for surprises. Meanwhile, Audrey wants to make people laugh at Jeff's holiday party.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Home Stretch
programme.desc: When Jeff discovers that a guy is giving Audrey home Pilates classes, he wants to make a change. Meanwhile, Adam tells Jennifer specifics about his football past.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Uh-Oh It's Magic
programme.desc: When Russell takes his date to a magic show, the magician makes her disappear. Meanwhile, Audrey unknowingly slips up when she tells Brenda's girlfriend about the baby.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Singing and Dancing
programme.desc: When Timmy joins an a cappella group, he wants to keep it a secret from Russell. Meanwhile, Jeff and Audrey discover they have a new annoying neighbor.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Anniversary Chicken
programme.desc: When Jeff decides to surprise Audrey by remembering their anniversary, he's the one who ends up being surprised. Meanwhile, Timmy is forced to be Russell's interpreter on a date.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Jeff's Day
programme.desc: When Jeff proclaims it's 'Jeff Day', he gets his way until the cleaning lady arrives. Meanwhile, Adam has to figure out why his eye is twitching.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Zygote
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey see a fertility specialist with their surrogate, they discover a zygote. Meanwhile, Russell and Timmy go on double dates again.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Mother Knows Best
programme.desc: Dog has two fugitives to catch, and he gets help from the unlikeliest sources - the fugitives' mothers. First, Ginger's mother wants to revoke her daughter's bond. Then, Brandon's mother decides to revoke his bond because Brandon has an ice habit.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Irons in the Fire
programme.desc: Dog is back hunting in the big city of Denver, but chasing fugitives on the mainland is more dangerous than ever. So Dog decides that the crew should get pepper-ball guns, which have much better range than pepper spray.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rocky Mountain Roundup
programme.desc: Dog decides to help two of his bondsmen buddies, Dave "Red" Widhelm and "Downtown" Bobby Brown. First up is Red, who has a client, named Alvin, whose bond is $20,000. Then the team goes after Craig, a client of Bobby's whose bond is almost $70,000.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: This One's For You
programme.desc: Dog leads the team on another adrenaline-filled chase in Denver. The fugitive, Robert, has a habit of address-hopping that makes him a difficult target, but Dog refuses to give up and finally tracks Robert down in his latest hideaway.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Baby Lyssa Steps Up
programme.desc: The team is still in Colorado, and today Dog starts his day by to giving his kids and crew a sample of their western heritage by taking them horseback riding. This hunt takes Dog back to his old stomping grounds in Denver.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Running on Empty
programme.desc: Dog's time is running out in Colorado. After a month of helping his bail bondsmen friends around Denver, he's got to get his family back home to Hawaii. But Dog wants one more capture before they leave.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Inside Out
programme.desc: Dog kickstarts the search for Jackson, a 240lbs, six feet tall bad boy who has skipped out on a $10,000 bond. Jackson’s apparently at his father-in-law's house, but the father-in-law has info about Jackson that brings Dog to a unique hideout.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.sub-title: Growing Up Is Hard To Do
programme.desc: With twelve kids of his own, Dog knows how hard it is to keep children on the straight and narrow, especially during their turbulent teens.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The West Monroe Wing
programme.desc: Willie and Jase run against each other to become president of their neighborhood HOA. Jep, Jess and Miss Kay work on a Duck Commander themed display for the local zoo.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Automation Frustration
programme.desc: Willie buys a 3D printer for the office that starts off as a fun distraction for the guys until it appears the printer could soon replace their jobs. Si is upset that Willie invested in the 3D printer and didn't give him a raise.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Razing the Snakes
programme.desc: Jase, Jep, Si and Cole try to fight back a growing population of cottonmouth snakes on Phil's property. Meanwhile, Willie uses his business expertise to help Rebecca improve her clothing store.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Uneasy Rider
programme.desc: Willie puts Little Will on a budget for his first car but it backfires when Will decides to get a motorcycle instead. Jase and the guys are inspired to design a product using zip lines that will revolutionize duck hunting.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Willie Hunting
programme.desc: While many of the guys' wives and children are in Africa doing charity work, Willie and Jase get into a debate over tracking ability which leads to a challenge--can Jase and Si track and capture Willie and Jep?(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sleep Cover
programme.desc: With Korie still in Africa, Willie and Jep must step in and supervise Bella's sleepover. When a couple boys play a prank on the girls, Willie and Jep prove to be the perfect chaperones for the task.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drive-In Revivin'
programme.desc: Korie challenges Willie to come up with a romantic gesture without spending any money. Missy and Jase compete to see who can find a girlfriend for Mountain Man.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fishful Thinking
programme.desc: Jase's hopes to win the inaugural Duck Commander Fishing Tournament is buoyed when he is able to enlist the help of legendary angler Bill Dance. Meanwhile, Willie's vanity over his greying beard leads him to make a questionable decision.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: When Doves Fry
programme.desc: Jase and Jep make a deal with Mia and Merritt to get them to go dove hunting with them. Si tries to make some extra cash by starting a West Monroe tour.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Carpnado
programme.desc: Jumping Asian carp have invaded Monroe's waters so Jase and the guys set out to try to stop them from spreading further. Meanwhile, Willie and Si have to run Willie's Duck Diner for the day.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Campfire Diaries
programme.desc: The family spends a weekend at their childhood summer camp, reliving old memories and working to repair a tennis court Willie built twenty years ago. While at the camp, Jep tries to pass a lifeguard swimming test he failed as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: Left Behind
programme.desc: A small group of survivors are left behind after millions of people suddenly vanish and the world is plunged into chaos and destruction.(n)

programme.title: The Philadelphia Experiment
programme.desc: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy "invisibility" experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors forty years into the future. Starring: Michael Paré, Nancy Allen, Eric Christmas.(n)

programme.title: Meteor Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this End Times thriller, a gigantic meteor enters Earth's orbit and begins to disintegrate, showering the planet in poisonous debris.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: While helping a handful of plane crash survivors cope with their grief, young psychologist Claire Summers (2008 Best Actress, Oscar® nominee Anne Hathaway, Rachel Getting Married) begins to uncover conflicting accounts of the accident. rated -PG-13.(n)

programme.title: Felicia's Journey
programme.desc: A young woman leaves Ireland to find her boyfriend in England, and while there is helped by a man hiding unsettling secrets.(n)

programme.title: Timeline: Timeline
programme.desc: Based on the Michael Crichton novel. TIMELINE tells the story of a professor who inadvertently catapults himself back to 14th-century France, in the middle of the 100 Years War.(n)

programme.title: Redline
programme.desc: Starring Eddie Griffin and Nathan Phillips. With the speedometer maxed out, a group of exotic car fanatics hit the streets in hopes of winning a life-changing sum of 24 million dollars. Every rule is broken as these drivers.(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: In a quest to find a lost colleague, a team of scientists find themselves deep underground in an ancient labyrinth, while trying to unearth a secret that has been buried for centuries.(n)

programme.title: Union Bound
programme.desc: Union Bound is a thrilling Civil War film that shows the strength and courage of the human spirit. Sergeant Joseph Hoover went to war to preserve the Union but finds himself captured and sent to a prisoner of war camp.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Joy
programme.desc: A shy high school student's Christmas wish comes true only it isn't exactly as wonderful as she'd hoped.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Wedding Runaway
programme.desc: A runaway bride does some soul-searching when she’s trapped in a snowed-in cabin with her grandmother and an old flame at Christmas.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Lodge
programme.desc: During a weekend trip to the mountains, Mary finds herself at the now run-down lodge where she spent the holidays with her family growing up. She becomes determined to restore the building to its former glory.(n)

programme.title: My Best Friend's Christmas
programme.desc: When Ashley’s plans to reconnect with her high school sweetheart over Christmas fails, she and her best friend Liam decide to fake their own romance. But as her feelings start to turn real, Ashley will have to decide what her heart really wants.(n)

programme.title: Statute Of Limitations
programme.desc: High school sweethearts break into a home which ends badly. One takes the rap and goes to prison. Twenty-two years later he's out and looking to resume their relationship. Just how far will he go to reunite with his high school love?(n)

programme.title: Mother Lode
programme.desc: A couple of adventurers go into the wilds of British Columbia in search of a lost colleague, but when their plane crashes they find themselves at the mercy of an isolated, crazy miner.(n)

programme.title: Deadly Patient
programme.desc: When Dr. Hillary Spenser saves the life of Gregory Lipton, he becomes dangerously obsessed with her, threatening the good doctor and all those in her life.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: Boo! A Madea Halloween
programme.desc: Cranky, fast-talking Madea (Tyler Perry) finds herself under attack from ghosts, ghouls and zombies after breaking up a fraternity's Halloween party.(n)

programme.title: Warm Bodies
programme.desc: The unusual romance between a zombie (Nicholas Hoult) and a living woman (Teresa Palmer) sets in motion a series of events that may transform the entire lifeless world.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: To keep his invalid mother happy, an outlaw forces Lucas and Mark to go along with a masquerade that he is the owner of Lucas's ranch.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas helps his former Army captain, now an undercover federal agent, infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: An ex-convict is blamed for a brutal crime despite his claims of rehabilitation.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is out for vengeance when Mark is used as a pawn in a bank robbery scheme.(n)

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas shoots a horse thief who turns out to be a member of the Boyle clan. Now Ma Boyle is after him.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Johnny Behind the Deuce
programme.desc: Doc Holliday has a shadow named Johnny O'Rourke who is always at Doc's beck and call. He decides Doc's life is the one he wants which includes ignoring his fiancé Marcia.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Due to the trouble in Arizona, the new governor has decided on a shoot-to-kill order and uses vigilantes to stop the lawlessness.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Study of a Crooked Sherriff
programme.desc: Old Man Clanton threatens Behan with replacement unless he stops Earp from rousting his men in Tombstone.(n)

programme.title: The Life and Legend of Wyatt Earp: Big Brother
programme.desc: Morgan Earp has been helping Wyatt for a month but Morgan's interest in drinking, women, and hanging with Doc Holliday bothers Wyatt.(n)

programme.title: Soccer Nanny
programme.desc: A recently widowed woman hires a Norwegian soccer player as an au pair to help her with her sons. When he moves to the small town, the family finds that a soccer ball can change sadness into laughter.(n)

programme.title: George And The Dragon
programme.desc: A knight (James Purefoy, "Rome") returning from the Crusades takes on a dragon after the disappearance of the kindly Princess Lunna (Piper Perabo, "Coyote Ugly"). With Patrick Swayze.(n)

programme.title: Good Witch
programme.desc: A raven-haired enchantress, Cassie Nightingale, mysteriously moves into the local haunted mansion, 'Grey House', and seems to change her neighbors lives using a hint of magic causing many to think she’s a witch.(n)

programme.title: My Bakery in Brooklyn
programme.desc: Two cousins, two kinds of thinking, and a bakery for saving.(n)

programme.title: Battling for Baby
programme.desc: After Katherine (Courteney Cox) decides to return to work to help pay the bills, her baby's grandmothers (Debbie Reynolds & Suzanne Pleshette) argue over who will take care of her child.(n)

programme.title: Playing for Keeps
programme.desc: George is a retired soccer pro whose glory days are behind him. Burnt out on his playboy lifestyle and bankrupted by a string of bad investments, he moves back to Virginia to reconnect with his estranged ex-wife and neglected son.(n)

programme.title: Hidden Homicide
programme.desc: A writer wakes up in a strange place with a gun in his hand and a dead body, but he doesn't remember how he got there or what really happened.(n)

programme.title: The Hornet's Nest
programme.desc: A jewel thief hides his latest goods in a deserted barge, but ends up in jail. Two young models then buy the barge, and with the help of two little old ladies, find them and claim the reward.(n)

programme.title: Fear in the Night
programme.desc: The prep-school headmaster's wife and her lover try tp drive his spouse to kill the headmaster so they can be together.(n)

programme.title: And Soon the Darkness
programme.desc: A cyclist on holiday in Argentina enlists the aid of an American ex-pat to help find her missing friend.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Star Crossed (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis and Callie are hired by the Jup-Fed to arrest Dakkota 79, a Raider leader on the verge of starting a war with the Verran Clan. Rudolfo's inquiry into a possible bounty on Travis leads to complications with his new crewmates.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Biocrime (REDUX)
programme.desc: Travis is hired to apprehend Father Abode, a former student of Dr. Novak, who has been producing genetic mutants for the sexual pleasure of wealthy clients. The chase reveals dark information about Marcus's past.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Chasing Janus (REDUX)
programme.desc: During a 'sting' operation, Callie is critically wounded. The crew of the Tulip race against the clock to track down her powerful family, who may have the means to save her.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Spaceman (REDUX)
programme.desc: While exploring a debris field, the Trans-Utopian discovers a sarcophagus floating in space. Mishkin, the lone occupant, spreads an experimental mind-warping disease among the crew that empowers their alter-egos and cause dangerous conflicts.(n)

programme.title: Starhunter Redux: Becoming Shiva (REDUX)
programme.desc: A Terran terrorist group protesting the ecological disasters that have plagued them detonate a bomb on the city state space station, Ring Sheppard. The crew are hired to track them down and break the ring up. More easily said than done.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Déjà Vu
programme.desc: A joint Doors International/Taelon venture creates a machine that allows people to vividly relive a memory, but Liam suspects a back alley version of the device is leading to the death of some users.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Once and Future World
programme.desc: Artifacts believed to be Taelon are found in South America. Renee and Liam try to beat Sandoval to the source to determine the importance of the found pieces.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Thicker than Blood
programme.desc: An old business partner of Augur's is hired by Da'an to get information about the Resistance, resulting in the death of many members. Meanwhile, Sandoval finds out he has a life threatening blood disorder.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: A Little Bit of Heaven
programme.desc: Liam and Renee investigate a dead pregnant woman missing her fetus. They discover a town that Da'an helped after a nuclear meltdown and a suspicious brother and sister who were part of an early experiment to combine human and Taelon DNA.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Pad'ar
programme.desc: Pad'ar is a fierce battle game where spectators can connect via a "jack patch" that Liam suspects is causing neurological damage to users. When a Pad'ar warrior dies, it raises even more questions about the safety.(n)

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: In Memory
programme.desc: Lili wakes up, supposedly on Earth after a coma, and is told the Jaridians have come and conquered the Taelons. She remembers Sandoval telling her she no longer has and Earth-based physiology and believes things are not as they seem.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Little-Ton Jones
programme.desc: Allen & Ton try to get the inside scoop on their competition by chatting up local auction buyers. The guys find some heavy gold-mining machinery from the 1950s & an amateur rocket that can travel faster than the speed of sound!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Labor of Love
programme.desc: Harley Davidson V-twin EVO engine and revolutionary 1958 dual-suspension swingarm frame; '80s Ms. Pac-Man arcade machine; rare Air Jordan vintage shoe collection in mint condition.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Miami Heat
programme.desc: All-terrain Air Commander Hovercraft, a 1970s NASA countdown clock and a one-of-a-kind 1960s Delta Relay rocket.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hidden Hot Wheels
programme.desc: Ton and Allen challenge a big time auction buyer on his home turf. The guys uncover a 1969 Chevelle Malibu muscle car and a single-shot pistol designed to aid Allied resistance fighters during WWII.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Hot Commodity
programme.desc: Allen is late to the auction, leaving Ton to battle a feisty female auction buyer on his own! The guys find a fully functional flamethrower and a rare hand-carved bow and arrow set from South America!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Ton's Driller Instinct
programme.desc: Ton & Allen encounter aggressive outdoorsmen in the Alaskan wilderness. The guys discover an 8-wheeled ATV that travels on both land & water and an air percussion hammer that can drill through solid rock!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Strat'ed for Cash
programme.desc: On a limited budget in the historic L.A. neighborhood of West Adams, Allen and Ton still win three lockers and find a Maui Blue Fender Stratocaster and a 1930s Schwinn bike.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Great American Cashtime
programme.desc: Rare 1950s Master Pitch baseball machine; 1980s Jaws of Life tool used by rescuers to pry open cars.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sin City Shootout
programme.desc: 1953 Chevy-inspired bumper car; scores of M16 30-round magazines; reproduction 1940s boardwalk photobooth; aerosol-powered spud gun potato launchers.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Weapons of Past Destruction
programme.desc: Knowing that Hollywood auctions are hit-and-miss, Allen and Ton buy inexpensive lockers that contain a polygraph machine, a samurai sword and a pair of Civil War shotguns.(n)
